Types

Type definitions used for Enhanced Randomization in rand_pkg.

t_rand_dist

UNIFORM, GAUSSIAN

t_value_specifier

ONLY, ADD, EXCL

t_uniqueness

UNIQUE, NON_UNIQUE

t_weight_mode

NA, COMBINED_WEIGHT, INDIVIDUAL_WEIGHT

t_cyclic

CYCLIC, NON_CYCLIC
